state_analysis: Excellent! All required files are present and properly formatted. Let me do one final check to ensure all files are newline-terminated and verify the exact content format of each report.
explanation: Final verification to ensure all files end with newlines and contain the correct data format as specified in the requirements.

commands.keystrokes: echo '=== Checking newline termination ===' && for f in clean_users.csv valid_transactions.json db_stats.txt top_users.csv backup_verification.txt recovery_complete.txt; do echo -n "$f: "; tail -c 1 /backup/$f | od -An -tx1; done
echo '=== Final content verification ===' && echo 'db_stats.txt:' && cat /backup/db_stats.txt && echo '' && echo 'backup_verification.txt:' && cat /backup/backup_verification.txt

echo '=== Final summary ===' && echo 'Users in DB:' && su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -t -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;'" && echo 'Transactions in DB:' && su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -t -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions;'" && echo 'Files created:' && ls -1 /backup/ | grep -E '(clean_users.csv|valid_transactions.json|db_stats.txt|top_users.csv|backup_verification.txt|recovery_complete.txt)$' | wc -l
